channel.title: TypeScript on Ricercar
channel.description: Recent content in TypeScript on Ricercar

item.title: Software construction course by MIT
item.description: This was a great weekend read. I was familiar with most of the concepts introduced in this course, but it was great to have them introduced in more formal way. The course uses typescript, and I finally got some exposure to it. Maybe as a next step I should use it to build something - something for the future. I think it’s a great course for people just joining the workforce as software devs.
